title.rendered: Wireless Earbuds Mezone B40 TWS True Wireless Headphones Bluetooth Earphones Deep Bass Noise Cancelling Headset IPX8…

content.rendered:
Bluetooth 5.1 & Easy to Pair

Our Mezone B40 wi-fi earphones are straightforward to attach.

For the primary time setup:

Step1 Open the charging case, you will notice “B40” shows in your bluetooth gadgets listing ,click on it.

Step2 Wait for 1-3 seconds , you will notice “Bluetooth Pairing Request” exhibits in your system,click on Pair.

You will see “B40 connected” shows in your telephone , your each earbuds are related to the telephone .

After the preliminary setup, Mezone auto-pairs to your system the second you open the charging case. There isn’t any must take the headphones out of the case. Just like that, open and pair.

Touch-Control Operation

  • Power On : Open the charging field
  • Play / Pause : Double-click the earbud
  • Next Song : Three-click the earbud
  • Answer/End Call :Double-click the earbud
  • Siri / Google assistant : Three-click the earbud

Upgraded Bluetooth 5.1 Chip

Mezone Bluetooth 5.0 earbuds are very straightforward to pair. After the preliminary setup, Mezone earbuds auto-pair to your system the second you open the charging case.

Water resistent & Sweatproof

Perfect for laborious exercises and climate,excellent wi-fi headset for exercise,working,health,jogging,climbing,and and so forth.

Compatible for all bluetooth eligible gadgets

Our Mezone B40 wi-fi earbuds are suitable for all bluetooth eligible gadgets,true wi-fi earbuds for iphone and huawei,samsung,xiaomi,LG,realme,and so forth.

Ergonomic Design

Ergonomic Design Allows for Ultimate Wearing Comfort to Match any Active Lifestyle, Such as Running, Jogging, Cycling, Driving, Camping, Hiking, Gym Exercise, Business, Relaxation and More Lifestyles.

Fast USB C Charging

With usb c cable,you may cost your Mezone earbuds quicker as much as 80% energy in lower than 30min.

4 Microphones Enhance Call Quality – The in ear headphones are outfitted with 4 microphones to gather name voices and cut back noise. Thanks to CVC 8.0 noise cancellation, the wi-fi headphones successfully suppress 90% of the noise.
All Day Listening & Easy to Pair – Mezone Bluetooth 5.0 earbuds are very straightforward to pair. After the preliminary setup, Mezone earbuds auto-pair to your system the second you open the charging case. Our blue tooth headphones supplies as much as 5 hours continuous music time or discuss time on single full cost, and 20 additional hours within the compact charging case.A kind c cable is included within the package deal to cost the case.

Please cost the product first earlier than use.Mezone earpods are suitable for each ios and android .There is 12 months guarantee for Mezone B40 ear pods,in case you have any considerations or issues with our merchandise ,please contact us ,we are going to allow you to at any time.
